titlestmt.titleproper: Commonwealth Fund records, Grants, Accession 2000:032, SG 2
A Guide to the Commonwealth Fund records, Grants, Accession 2000:032, SG 2 FA1405

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-09-02 20:05:00 -0400.

did.unittitle: Commonwealth Fund records, Grants, Accession 2000:032, SG 2

physdesc.extent: 16 standard letter document boxes, 1 3x5 card file

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of the RAC.

When requesting to view audiovisual material, please refer to the Title and the AV Number (example: AV 1916). Researchers are asked to check the "Restrictions" note for each Title. If a Title does not currently have an access copy, please contact a RAC archivist for further instruction.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Grants Management office files including but not limited to: Program Reviews and Grant Lists 1983-1990; Program Management Committee files, grant administration files, and associated background papers, correspondence and several financial reports and budgets.
